usage.title: Usage
usage.addtransitioni: Drag from one state to another
usage.addloopi: Drag from one state to the same (movement >3px)
usage.selecta: Selects state/transition and shows further information and the editor
usage.colori: Click on color input in the upper right corner
usage.colora: Assign a color, i.e. for grouping purposes
